_header: All that been in deadly sin and think with mercy to meet
Subjects: Margaret, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: The Life of St Margaret — in long-line quatrains

NLS1921.First Lines:
Al þat ben in dedly sinne & þenk wiþ merci to
                    meteLeue in crist þat ȝaue ȝou wiit ȝour sinnes forto
                    bete…
NLS1921.Last Lines:
…& grace forto ȝeme ous Out of dedli sinne& grant
                    ous þe miche ioie Þer seynt mergrete is inne
NLS1921.Note:
Begins 16rb, but first 4 lines cut out of MS; written half
                    line of verse per line of MS (one couplet per two lines); or quatrains,
                    abcb.
